items.sentence: I\'d like to talk to Tom about his brother John.
Tom said he had a terrible experience in Boston.
We need to learn all we can about what happened.
I can\'t put up with Tom\'s rudeness any longer.
I don\'t eat desserts unless I make them myself.
I don\'t like swimming in public swimming pools.
You might want to be more careful in the future.
Tom told me that he was going to commit suicide.
I can barely keep up with the rest of the class.
Tom is the great-great-grandson of John Jackson.
